block_comment: This block of Verilog code manages the write-enable control signal for a system tag. By selectively turning on the output based on the selected source, it enables writing to be performed when the source signal corresponds to "C_INVA", "C_FILL", or "C_INIT", and it prevents writing when the signal corresponds to "C_CORE". Other unlabelled sources are also defaulted to not having write access.
